org.cougaar.core.service
Interface BlackboardTimestampService

All Superinterfaces:
Service
public interface BlackboardTimestampService
extends Service

This service tracks timestamps for the ADD (BlackboardService.publishAdd(java.lang.Object)) and the more recent modification (BlackboardService.publishChange(java.lang.Object)) of UniqueObjects.

These timestamps are not persisted, and upon rehydration the creation time of the objects will be the agent restart time.

See Also:
TimestampSubscription

getTimestampEntry

TimestampEntry getTimestampEntry(UID uid)
Get the TimestampEntry for the local blackboard UniqueObject with the given UID.

The timestamps are measured in milliseconds, and matches the transaction close times of the blackboard subscriber that performed the "publishAdd()" or "publishChange()".

The underlying (UID, TimestampEntry) map is dynamically maintained by a separate subscriber. These methods are thread safe. Clients should be aware that multiple calls to "getTimestampEntry(..)" may return different responses.

The service provider of this service may restrict the set of UniqueObjects covered by this service. UniqueObjects that are not covered have null TimestampEntry values.

Returns:
the TimestampEntry for the UniqueObject with the specified UID, or null if not known.
